issues.title: Economic Policy
issues.description: Strong support for free market principles, tax cuts, and reducing government regulation on businesses
issues.source: Campaign website and Republican Party platform

issues.title: Border Security
issues.description: Advocates for stricter immigration enforcement, completing border wall, and reducing illegal immigration
issues.source: Campaign speeches and Republican policy statements

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Opposes government-run healthcare, supports market-based healthcare solutions and repealing Affordable Care Act

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of gun ownership rights, opposes additional gun control legislation

issues.title: Energy Independence
issues.description: Supports expanded domestic oil and gas production, opposes Green New Deal, promotes fossil fuel development
issues.source: Energy policy statements and campaign platform

issues.title: Education Policy
issues.description: Supports school choice, charter schools, and local control of education standards

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Advocates for strong national defense, supporting military spending, and robust anti-terrorism efforts
